name: Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club
tagline: Working repositores for the Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club
body:
###Homer Multitext project###

Github repositories are being coordinated through the 
[HMT editors' project][hmt].

###Archimedes project###

- [Editors' repository](https://github.com/HCMID/archimedes-hc)


###Jerome's *Chronicles* project###

- [Build system for assembling digital publication](https://github.com/HCMID/jerome)
- Editing manuscript [Geneva 49](https://github.com/HCMID/gen49)
- Editing manuscript [St. Gallen, Vadianische Sammlung 298](https://github.com/HCMID/vadslg298)



[hmt]: http://hmteditors.github.io/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
